titles: By the mayor the right honourable the lord mayor, and his brethren the aldermen of the city of London, considering how the infection of the plague is dispersed in divers and sundry places neere about this city, doe ... command all manner of persons ... to take notice of, and obserue these seuerall articles ensuing ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
publisher: Printed by Robert Young, Printer to the honourable Citie of London,
notes: At head of sheet, royal arms, and shield.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
